duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinates administrative processes, database maintenance, budget management, and HR reporting
Oversees website design and maintenance, ensuring practicality and promoting use for the targeted audience
Administers budgets and processes accounting transfers, deposits, and payroll
Coordinates HR actions and implements changes to HR policy & procedures
Manages complex scheduling arrangements, sets up and cancels meetings, coordinates large-scale events
Coordinates student recruitment, admissions process, and program evaluation
Prepares and compiles correspondence, reports, complex spreadsheets, and databases based on supervisor's objectives

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
5 years of administrative support or relevant experience
